## isRuleSet() function

Validates if the input object contains the expected properties of a ruleset

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
declare function isRuleSet(input: unknown): input is Record<string, unknown>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  input | unknown | The object containing a rule set |

<b>Returns:</b>

input is Record&lt;string, unknown&gt;

True if a valid rule set
